posts.title: Video Steganography
posts.description:
Hide Your secret videos inside any other videos. It supports video of any aspect ratio. It hides audio along with the video.
It follows the LSB algorithm for encryption

posts.title: Drawing with Fourier Series and Epicycle
posts.description: Draw any figure using maths with the use of DFT(Fourier series in the exponential form) and epicycle.
